doc.field: Dorothy Donnell Steers Collection of Coleman Dowell Letters
Dorothy Donnell Steers Collection of Coleman Dowell Letters

Dorothy Donnell Steers (1925-2016) was a friend of Coleman Dowell from Simpson County High School in Franklin, Kentucky. This collection consists of seven letters from writer Coleman Dowell to Steers. In the letters, Dowell discusses his recent writings, asks for Steers' opinion on his works, shares updates on his family, and expresses his hopes for a reunion with his high school friends.

Donated by Paula Steers Brown in December 2023; the accession number associated with this gift is 2024.009.
